name: Islands of DA-BA-DEE
description:
Throw the infected village folk off the island before the virus spreads and Keep the death count as low as possible!

This game was made for Forge Jam IX.

Themes included in the game:      Time, Virus, Lowest Score Wins, Connected, Islands

Gamepad required*

Developed by:

Aaron Duke ~ programming and art

Gregory Johnson ~ programming

Brendan Lindlbauer ~ programming

Xavier Mkrtumian ~ art

Andrew Duke ~ voice sounds
